name: Pull Ups on Machine
how_to_perform:
1. Sit in the pull-up machine with your feet placed flat on the footrest and your back straight against the backrest.

2. Hold onto the bar with a shoulder-width overhand grip, keeping your elbows close to your body.

3. Engage your core by pulling your belly button towards your spine.

4. Begin to lift yourself up using your Lat muscles, bringing your upper body closer to the top of the machine. Keep your movements controlled and smooth throughout the exercise.

5. When you reach the highest point, pause briefly before slowly lowering yourself back down to the starting position.

6. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, focusing on using your Back muscles to perform each repetition correctly.
short_summary: Pull-ups are a strength training exercise that primarily works the Lat and upper Back muscles, performed in a seated machine.
